TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit JScriptException extends System.ApplicationException implements class Microsoft.JScript.IVsaFullErrorInfo, class Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaError

public ref class JScriptException : ApplicationException, Microsoft::JScript::IVsaFullErrorInfo
type JScriptException = class inherit ApplicationException interface IVsaFullErrorInfo interface IJSVsaError

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown by JScript to notify a common language runtime (CLR) host or program that an error occurred. A usually takes a enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A <xref:Microsoft.JScript.JScriptException> is also an <xref:Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaError> and can be passed to the host through <xref:Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaSite.OnCompilerError*>.
